languages.text: "Я полностью разделяю ваше негодование, Лорд-капитан. Столь вопиющее отношение к ресурсам корабля неприемлемо!"
"I fully share your indignation, Lord Captain. Such blatant abuse of the ship's resources is unacceptable!"
languages.original_text: "Я полностью разделяю ваше негодование, Лорд-капитан. Столь вопиющее отношение к ресурсам корабля неприемлемо!"

traits.locale_text: "I fully share your indignation, Lord Captain. Such blatant abuse of the ship's resources is unacceptable!"
"I fully share your indignation, Lord Captain. Such blatant abuse of the ship's resources is unacceptable!"
"I fully share your indignation, Lord Captain. Such blatant abuse of the ship's resources is unacceptable!"
"I fully share your indignation, Lord Captain. Such blatant abuse of the ship's resources is unacceptable!"
"I fully share your indignation, Lord Captain. Such blatant abuse of the ship's resources is unacceptable!"

languages.text: “我完全理解您的愤慨，舰长大人。这种滥用飞船资源的恶劣行为实在是不可接受！”
languages.original_text: "I fully share your indignation, Lord Captain. Such blatant abuse of the ship's resources is unacceptable!"

traits.locale_text: “我完全理解您的愤慨，舰长大人。这种滥用飞船资源的恶劣行为实在是不可接受！”

languages.text: « Je partage pleinement votre indignation, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Un détournement aussi flagrant des ressources du vaisseau est inacceptable ! »
languages.original_text: "I fully share your indignation, Lord Captain. Such blatant abuse of the ship's resources is unacceptable!"

traits.locale_text: « Je partage pleinement votre indignation, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Un détournement aussi flagrant des ressources du vaisseau est inacceptable ! »

languages.text: «Comparto plenamente su indignación, Lord Capitán. ¡Abusar así de los recursos de la nave es un acto inadmisible!».
languages.original_text: "I fully share your indignation, Lord Captain. Such blatant abuse of the ship's resources is unacceptable!"

traits.locale_text: «Comparto plenamente su indignación, Lord Capitán. ¡Abusar así de los recursos de la nave es un acto inadmisible!».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、あなたの憤りは私にも分かります。このような、船の資源のあからさまな乱用は容認できません！」
languages.original_text: "I fully share your indignation, Lord Captain. Such blatant abuse of the ship's resources is unacceptable!"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、あなたの憤りは私にも分かります。このような、船の資源のあからさまな乱用は容認できません！」

languages.text: "Auch ich bin entrüstet, Lord Captain. Ein solch offensichtlicher Missbrauch der Schiffsressourcen ist nicht hinzunehmen!"
languages.original_text: "I fully share your indignation, Lord Captain. Such blatant abuse of the ship's resources is unacceptable!"

traits.locale_text: "Auch ich bin entrüstet, Lord Captain. Ein solch offensichtlicher Missbrauch der Schiffsressourcen ist nicht hinzunehmen!"

languages.text: "Öfkenizi paylaştığımdan emin olabilirsiniz Lord Kaptan. Geminin kaynakları böyle savurganca kullanılamaz!"
languages.original_text: "I fully share your indignation, Lord Captain. Such blatant abuse of the ship's resources is unacceptable!"
